response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, is worth $1,000,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $950,000, a generous discount that reflects my confidence in its unparalleled quality and the unique benefits it will bring to you. I am certain that this investment will yield significant returns and contribute greatly to your endeavors. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
